name: Maria Papadopouli
content: Maria Papadopouli Maria Papadopouli Ph.D. Columbia University Professor Department of Computer Science University of Crete Institute of Computer Science Foundation for Research and Technology-Hellas (FORTH) Rersearch Interests: Networks, Mobile computing, Internet of Things, Telecommunications, Performance Analysis Computational Neuroscience, Brain Networks Analysis & Modeling Curriculum Vitae: in english Mobile Computing & Networking Brain Networks Analysis & Modeling Tel:  +30 2810 39 16 77 Fax:  +30 2810 39 16 01
